original_solution_mapping.L1: His hair grew 36 inches - 6 inches = <<36-6=30>>30 inches
original_solution_mapping.L2: Hair grows at a rate of 12 months/year * 0.5 inches/month =<<12*0.5=6>>6 inches/year
original_solution_mapping.L3: It took him 30 inches / 6 inches/year = <<30/6=5>>5 years to grow his hair out.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6723.
    Returns: the number of years it took Bob to grow out his hair.
    """
    # L1
    current_length = 36 # 36 inches long
    initial_length = 6 # 6 inches
    total_growth = current_length - initial_length

    # L2
    months_per_year = 12 # WK
    monthly_growth_rate = 0.5 # .5 inches per month
    annual_growth_rate = months_per_year * monthly_growth_rate

    # L3
    time_in_years = total_growth / annual_growth_rate

    # FA
    answer = time_in_years
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: His hair grew {current_length} inches - {initial_length} inches = <<{current_length}-{initial_length}={total_growth}>>{total_growth} inches
Hair grows at a rate of {months_per_year} months/year * {monthly_growth_rate} inches/month =<<{months_per_year}*{monthly_growth_rate}={annual_growth_rate}>>{annual_growth_rate} inches/year
It took him {total_growth} inches / {annual_growth_rate} inches/year = <<{total_growth}/{annual_growth_rate}={time_in_years}>>{time_in_years} years to grow his hair out.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: His hair grew 36 inches - 6 inches = <<36-6=30>>30 inches
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Hair grows at a rate of 30 months/year * 0.5 inches/month =<<30*0.5=15>>15 inches/year
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: It took him 30 inches / 15 inches/year = <<30/15=2>>2 years to grow his hair out.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'total_growth' (30) was used instead of 'months_per_year' (12).
